import React from 'react' import './RecomVendor.css' import chef from '../images/chef.jpg' import dish from '../images/dish.jpg' import {useEffect} from 'react'; import {useSelector,useDispatch} from 'react-redux'; import {getProducts as listProducts} from '../redux/actions/productActions' function RecomVendor() { const dispatch=useDispatch(); const getProducts=useSelector(state=>state.getProducts); const {products,loading,error}=getProducts; useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(listProducts()) },[dispatch]) return (
